alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 8:15AM EST until further notice by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina... Neuse River At Kinston affecting Jones and Lenoir Counties. For the Neuse River...including Kinston, Fort Barnwell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neuse River at Kinston. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of the campground at the Nature Center is expected. Water encroaches onto other properties along the south side of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM EST Thursday was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.2 feet early Saturday afternoon, then begin to fall slowly thereafter. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM EST.
